title: A Childhood Store Eco-Friendly Tiny Car Crayons
description: Childhood Crayons are 100% handmade soy and beeswax crayons made in the USA. They come in a wide variety of fun shapes and colors that are meant to inspire creative play as well as happy coloring. Car Crayons: Set of 6 Crayons - Set includes one each Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue and Purple. - Each car measures 2" x 1.5" - Non-toxic, contains no paraffin wax. - Natural waxes make for softer, blendable crayons, more like a pastel. - Handmade and hand poured crayons may result in size and color variations. Crayons are packaged in a protective, recyclable cardboard tube 2.5" x 6.5"
